name: LINKAGERADIO
0:
”Alexa, play linkage radio”
”Alexa, ask linkage radio what is playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: linkage radio
Developer Terms of Use
des: Linkage radio has been known to capturize their audience with great programs twenty-four hours per day with all genres of music, talk shows and comedy to entice your emotions. We look forward for your listening ears and interaction and to become one of the thousand linkies family we ask you to share this app information so we can grow stronger in love and unity. Linkage radio has been based in new york but has a strong influence in the Caribbean and also in Africa. The linkage radio has been operating for over seventeen years which our listeners are our number one priority our email address is linkageradio@gmail.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
